original_text: And concerning the pillars, the height of one pillar was eighteen cubits; and a fillet of twelve cubits did compass it; and the thickness thereof was four fingers: it was hollow.
korean_text: 그 기둥은 한 기둥의 높이가 십팔 규빗이요 그 둘레는 십이 규빗이며 그 속이 비었고 그 두께는 네 손가락 두께이며

sentences.original_text: the height of one pillar was eighteen cubits
and a fillet of twelve cubits did compass it
and the thickness thereof was four fingers
